head.title: See all the methods on Node.js core modules
head.description: You can see all the methods on the Node.js core modules by entering the Node.js REPL, typing the name of the module you'd like to inspect,â€¦

body: You can see all the methods on the Node.js core modules by entering the Node.js REPL, typing the name of the module you'd like to inspect, typing a period, and hitting tab twice.
